Class MultipleChoiceQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs356.IVoteSimulator.Question
      • edu.cpp.cs356.IVoteSimulator.MultipleChoiceQuestion

  • public class MultipleChoiceQuestion
extends Question

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MultipleChoiceQuestion()
      Default constructor, sets selection limit to total number of candidate answers.
      MultipleChoiceQuestion(int limit)
      Constructs a MultipleChoiceQuestion with the specified limit on number of answers that can be selected.
      MultipleChoiceQuestion(java.lang.String question, java.lang.String[] responseChoices)
      Constructs a MultipleChoiceQuestion with the specified question and candidate answers.
      MultipleChoiceQuestion(java.lang.String question, java.lang.String[] responseChoices, int limit)
      Constructs a MultipleChoiceQuestion with the specified question, candidate answers, and limit on the number of answers that can be selected.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultipleChoiceQuestion

        public MultipleChoiceQuestion()
        Default constructor, sets selection limit to total number of candidate answers.

      • MultipleChoiceQuestion

        public MultipleChoiceQuestion(int limit)
        Constructs a MultipleChoiceQuestion with the specified limit on number of answers that can be selected.
        Parameters:
        limit - the maximum number of answers that can be selected

      • MultipleChoiceQuestion

        public MultipleChoiceQuestion(java.lang.String question,
                              java.lang.String[] responseChoices)
        Constructs a MultipleChoiceQuestion with the specified question and candidate answers. The maximum number of answers that can be selected is set to the number of candidate answers.
        Parameters:
        question - the question to be stored
        responseChoices - the candidate answers

      • MultipleChoiceQuestion

        public MultipleChoiceQuestion(java.lang.String question,
                              java.lang.String[] responseChoices,
                              int limit)
        Constructs a MultipleChoiceQuestion with the specified question, candidate answers, and limit on the number of answers that can be selected.
        Parameters:
        question - the question to be stored
        responseChoices - the candidate answers
        limit - the maximum number of candidate answers that can be selected
